title: Molly Sims, 46, showcases her killer bikini body as she lounges on swing in leopard print
text:
Molly Sims is one hot mama.

The model, 46, showcased her killer bikini body while basking in the Mexican sunshine during her recent getaway to Cabo San Lucas.

In a snap posted to her Instagram, Molly was looking every inch the beach babe as she sat upon a wicker swing wearing a tiny leopard print bathing suit.

Hot mama! Molly Sims showcased her killer bikini body while basking in the Mexican sunshine during her current getaway to Cabo San Lucas

'Because if you're wearing a bikini on a Monday, it's a good day... (even if it's for an hour),' she captioned the snap Wednesday, including a bikini emoji.

Molly was in complete vacation mode while enjoying a moment out in the fresh air.

The model rocked a sun-kissed glow, a slicked back hairstyle, a cool pair of shades, and little else for the beachy outing.

And by the looks of her smile, Molly was having the time of her life relaxing in the beachfront town.

Beach babe! Sims worked a mustard yellow bathing suit and wide-brim hat during her trip

Molly has been documenting her envy-inducing getaway on her Instagram account, of course.

Whether she's hanging out in her bikini or heading to the beach in a dress, Molly has been making the most of her time outside of the city.

A model, author, and mom of three, no doubt the time away from her routine was much-needed for Molly.

Que bonita! Molly wore a pretty hippie chic dress while taking in the ocean breeze

The vacation didn't last forever and by Thursday Molly appeared back at home in Los Angeles.

Molly has been married since 2011 to movie producer Scott Stuber, and the couple share sons Brooks, seven, Grey, two, and daughter Scarlett, four.

Speaking about her secret to balancing her job with her children, she told Hello! back in 2017: 'I think you just have to get ahead of yourself. Get on a calendar and get organized: that's the best piece of advice I've ever been given.'
description: In a snap posted to her Instagram, Molly wore a tiny leopard print bathing suit as she sat upon a wicker swing. Molly has been documenting her envy-inducing getaway on her Instagram.
